item.title: 제이슨 데룰로(Jason Derulo) - Swalla(feat. Nicki Minaj & Ty Dolla $ign)
item.description:

Love in a thousand
different flavors
I wish that I could taste
them all tonight
No I ain’t got no dinner plans
So you should bring
all your friends
I swear that to Allah
you’re my type

if you’re feeling thirsty
